snippet: A 25,000-word article on the nation’s health care system appears to be on course to become Time magazine’s best-selling cover in nearly two years.
abstract: A 25,000-word article on the nation’s health care system appears to be on course to become Time magazine’s best-selling cover in nearly two years.

headline.main: Time's Health Care Opus Is a Hit
headline.print_headline: Time’s Opus on Health Care Resonates With Readers
